casebody.data:
State
v.
Jamison Christopher Goins 273A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 22, 2016 Shawn Robert Evans, Attorney at Law, for State of North Carolina. Andrew Nelson, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for Goins, Jamison Christopher.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of August 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of August 2016."

*154State of NC shall have up to and including the 28th day of September 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
